name: Epic Addons for Elementor
author: Epic Addons, LLC

sections.description:
It’s time to take your Elementor page building experience to the next level. It’s time to experience the most unique Elementor widgets with the most advanced options. It’s time for Epic Addons for Elementor.

With our 35+ advanced widgets you can create slick and sophisticated websites in less time with no coding required. Each widget is highly customizable, has trendy and unique design and lots of advanced options. So you can literelly create anything you want, only sky is the limit!

Documentation and Support

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our Documentation.
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.
  • For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at Epic Addons for Elementor.

Report Bugs or Contribute

Bug reports are welcomed on GitHub. Please note GitHub is not a support forum, and issues that arenâ€™t properly qualified as bugs will be closed. If you want to contribute on this project, please fork the repository from Github.
sections.installation:
It’s really easy to install Epic Addons for Elementor plugin, but before installing it make sure you’ve installed Elementor. Elementor is the only dependency.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.7 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 128 MB or greater

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New screen in WordPress.
  2. Search for Epic Addons for Elementor.
  3. Install and activate the plugin, that’s it.

Manual Installation

  1. Download Epic Addons for Elementor.
  2. Extract the 'epic-addons-for-elementor'.zip file. You’ll get plugin files inside 'epic-addons-for-elementor' directory.
  3. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/'epic-addons-for-elementor' directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin without Elementor?

No. You cannot use it without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work along with other Elementor addons?

Yes. You can use it with other Elementor addons.

Does it work with any theme?

Yes. It will work with any WordPress theme.

Does it work with Elementor Pro?

Yes, absolutely.
